div.bibl: Miscellaneous Material Belonging to Dr. Percy, 2559 W. Division Street. THE CELEBRATION OF THE BI-CENTENARY OF THE ACADEMY OF SCIENCES (1923)

body.p: The committee of the Russian Center of the city of Chicago invites the secretaries (and in case of their absence the leaders) of the following organizations:
1. The White Russian People's Society. (Note: Crossed out. D. S.)
2. The White Russian Committee (Note: Crossed out. D. S.)
10. Courses for General Education. (Note: Crossed out. D. S.)
12. Branch of the Industrial Workers of the World.
13. Orthodox Schools of the City of Chicago.
22. "Sich." (Note: A military Ukrainian organization. Crossed out in the Russian document, D. S.)
24. Federation of Russian Schools of the City of Chicago.
26. Chicago branch of the N. M. (Note: (Novy Mir, new world) Russian Communist newspaper published in New York. D. S.)
27. Chicago branch of the Rassviet (The Dawn).
to a meeting called for the purpose of working out the program of a solemn celebration of the bi-centenary of the Russian Academy of Sciences.

The committee of the Russian Center of the city of Chicago wishes to believe that as to this question the Russian colony of Chicago will not be divided into various partisan groups. This celebration is a holiday for all Russians, not only for these who are at present in their native land, but also for these who are outside its boundaries.
The meeting will take place at the House of Enlightenment, 1080 W. 14th street, on Tuesday, Sept beginning at 7:30 P. M. sharp. We carnestly beg you not to be too late.
The Secretary of the Russian Center of the City of Chicago.
